company_command.name: Company Command
company_command.description: A higher-ranking field officer trained to command more units and occasionally direct field operations.

platoon_command.name: Platoon Command
platoon_command.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

forward_artillery_observer.name: Forward Artillery Observer
forward_artillery_observer.description: An artillery forward observer able to call in a fire mission.

field_medic.name: Field Medic
field_medic.description: A trained field medic used to treat the wounded near the frontline.

veteran_infantry_squad.name: Veteran Infantry Squad
veteran_infantry_squad.description: A group of veteran hungarian infantry.

rapid_corps.name: Rapid Corps
rapid_corps.description: A group of mobile rapid corps.

veteran_rapid_corps.name: Veteran Rapid Corps
veteran_rapid_corps.description: A group of mobile rapid corps.

parachute_assault_squad.name: Parachute Assault Squad
parachute_assault_squad.description: A group of tough airborne troops.

veteran_parachute_assault_squad.name: Veteran Parachute Assault Squad
veteran_parachute_assault_squad.description: A group of tough airborne troops.

border_guards.name: Border Guards
border_guards.description: A group of low quality infantry.

arrow_cross_militia.name: Arrow Cross Militia
arrow_cross_militia.description: A group of fascists and party loyalists taken to arms. Like other fascist paramilitaries, they could range from barely trained and cowardly 'thugs', to fanatics and fascist veterans of street fights, battles, and previous wars.

assault_engineers.name: Assault Engineers
assault_engineers.description: Hungarian engineers which can be equipped to clear battlefield dangers or fight in deadly assaults.

veteran_assault_engineers.name: Assault Engineers
veteran_assault_engineers.description: Hungarian engineers which can be equipped to clear battlefield dangers or fight in deadly assaults.

flamethrower_team.name: Flamethrower Team
flamethrower_team.description: A team equipped to clear bunkers and other defensive positions.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: A team equipped to take out important targets from a distance.

at_rifle_team.name: AT Rifle Team
at_rifle_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting lighter tanks.

panzershreck_team.name: Panzerschreck Team
panzershreck_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

44m_pancelrem.name: 44M Páncélrém Team
44m_pancelrem.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

mmg_team.name: Tripod MG Team
mmg_team.description: A medium machinegun on a tripod mount.

light_mortar_team.name: Light Mortar Team
light_mortar_team.description: A light mortar carried by a small team.

medium_mortar_team.name: Medium Mortar Team
medium_mortar_team.description: A medium mortar carried by a small team.

pak_43.name: Pak 43 AT Gun
pak_43.description: A wheeled very heavy at gun.

43m_sorozatveta.name: 43M Sorozatveto
43m_sorozatveta.description: A wheeled light rocket artillery piece.

toldi_i.name: Toldi I
toldi_i.description: A very early light tank tank.

panzer_38t.name: Panzer 35(t)/38(t)
panzer_38t.description: A medium tank with a good main gun.

toldi_ii.name: Toldi II
toldi_ii.description: A very early light tank tank.

turan.name: 40M Turán
turan.description: A medium tank with a light main gun.

turan_ii.name: 40M Turán II
turan_ii.description: A medium tank with a medium main gun.

turan_iii.name: 40M Turán III
turan_iii.description: A medium tank with a heavy tank hunting main gun.

44m_zrinyi.name: 44M Zrínyi I
44m_zrinyi.description: A medium tank with a fixed powerful main gun.

hetzer.name: Jagdpanzer 38(t) Hetzer
hetzer.description: A medium tank with a fixed powerful main gun.

zrinyi_ii.name: 43M Zrínyi II
zrinyi_ii.description: An early infantry support medium tank with a fixed howitzer.

stug_III_f_h.name: Stug III F-H/Stug IV
stug_III_f_h.description: A medium tank with a fixed powerful main gun.

panzer_iv_b_f.name: Panzer IV B-F
panzer_iv_b_f.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

panzer_iv_j.name: Panzer IV G-J
panzer_iv_j.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

panther.name: Panther G
panther.description: A medium tank with a very powerful main gun.

tiger_i.name: Tiger I
tiger_i.description: A heavy tank with a very powerful main gun.

csaba_39m.name: Csaba 39M
csaba_39m.description: An armored recon car with a tank hunting rifle.

csaba_40m_command.name: Csaba 40M (Command)
csaba_40m_command.description: An armored command car with a supporting MG.

officer_training.name: Officer Training
officer_training.flavor: A swift and deadly end to a fight can come with a furious charge...
officer_training.description: Use when a Hungarian Infantry Officer unit is activated. That unit gets Field Orders(+1) for this activation and may activate 1 additional unit.

suppressive_fire.name: Suppressive Fire
suppressive_fire.flavor: With high rate of fire and a terrifying noise, machine-guns can be used to pin down enemy troops with ease.
suppressive_fire.description: Use when a Hungarian _Infantry_ unit that contains an LMG or Medium MG fires. If the attack hits, it assigns 2 additional shock to all affected targets.

huszar_tactics.name: Huszar Tactics
huszar_tactics.flavor: Aggressive armored pushes, can be highly effective at surrounding and destroying enemies.
huszar_tactics.description: Use when a _Tank_ or _Armored Car_ unit enters the field. It may make a free Move action.

at_all_costs.name: At All Costs
at_all_costs.description: This unit and friendly units within 6" automatically pass Break tests.

gusztav_jany.name: Gusztáv Jány
gusztav_jany.flavor: Gusztáv Jány assisted in the defense of Stalingrad against overwhelming Soviet forces, taking heavy losses as a result.
gusztav_jany.description: Upgrade one Field Officer model with At All Costs.
